title: Lee Hammond's Lifelike Drawing
description:
Lee Hammond's Lifelike Drawing

1 hr 23 mins | AVI | mp3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 128 kb/s | mpeg4, yuv420p, 720x404, 

29.97 fps | 785MB

Genre: Drawing



In this video workshop, Lee Hammond gives clear, friendly, easy to follow instruction as she demonstrates techniques for achieving lifelike drawings no matter what your subject. She shows you how to do smooth blending, gradual tonal changes, how to use a grid and how to work with soft and hard edges for more realism in your drawings. You'll learn what tools to use and how to use them for good results. A variety of subjects will be covered
